subject: College Athletics
Football
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Vuvuzelas, the plastic horns made famous during the 2010 soccer World Cup for their drowning buzz, will be banned for the 127th game between Harvard and Yale.
snippet: Vuvuzelas, the plastic horns made famous during the 2010 soccer World Cup for their drowning buzz, will be banned for the 127th game between Harvard and Yale.
